entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then clearing. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
